Title: Scientists are developing artificial blood that could save lives in emergencies
Description:
A research team has successfully tested a blood substitute in animals, and human trials may not be far off.
The powdered blood could help medics respond faster in a crisis.

Title: She lost her arm in a train accident. She was shocked by what happened next.
